description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Itza is an exciting puzzle game where your goal is to remove pairs of matching tiles and trying to clear the board before the time runs up. Explode tiles in combos to clear the level faster and to receive powerful powerups!
description.short: Itza is an exciting puzzle game where your goal is to remove pairs of matching tiles and trying to clear the board before the time runs up. Explode tiles in combos to clear the level faster and to receive powerful powerups!
